definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy

sentences.english: I'm feeling really dopey this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午我一直昏昏沉沉的。

sentences.english: Two and a half hours later, she emerges, dazed and emotional.
sentences.chinese: 兩個半小時後，她昏昏沉沉地出現在我面前。

sentences.english: Exhaust fumes made him drowsy and brought on a headache.
sentences.chinese: 廢氣把他薰得昏昏沉沉，還引起了頭疼。

sentences.english: You may experience what I call the fog of brain.
sentences.chinese: 你也許會經歷我先前所說的大腦昏昏沉沉這個狀態。

sentences.english: It can affect your sleep and make youfeel groggy and grumpy.
sentences.chinese: 這會影響睡眠以及讓人覺得昏沉和暴躁。

sentences.english: The afternoon drifted by heavily, inducing sleep.
sentences.chinese: 下午在沉重的睡眠中昏昏沉沉地度過。

sentences.english: I felt faint and dizzy as if the sky and earth began to reel.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得昏昏沉沉，好像天旋地轉。

sentences.english: When you are old and gray and full of sleep and nodding by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 當你老了，滿頭白髮，昏昏沉沉在爐火旁打盹。

sentences.english: Norton walks slowly toward his office. Dazed.
sentences.chinese: 諾頓昏沉沉地慢慢走向他的辦公室。

sentences.english: Michael sits comatose in the psych ward receiving room.
sentences.chinese: Michael昏昏沉沉地坐在精神病區接待室內。

sentences.english: Do you scoff down a huge lunch before feeling lethargic all afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 囫圇吞棗的喫完午飯，然後又整個下午昏昏沉沉？

sentences.english: But wake up, still one of the empty house, there are endless dazed.
sentences.chinese: 但醒來，依然是這個空蕩蕩的房子，還有無盡的昏沉。

sentences.english: He doped off for a little while.
sentences.chinese: 他昏昏沉沉地睡了一會兒。

sentences.english: Oversleeping disrupts your natural rhythm and leads to grogginess.
sentences.chinese: 過度的睡眠會使你的自然節奏被打亂並導致昏昏沉沉。

sentences.english: He was pretty goofed up that night.
sentences.chinese: 那晚他服用麻醉劑後被搞得昏昏沉沉。

sentences.english: Stumbling out the door, I headed home in a daze, walking alone in the middle of the night.
sentences.chinese: 踉蹌地走出門，我一個人在半夜昏昏沉沉地趕回家去。

definition: swelling of the head (physical condition)/fig. swellheaded/conceited
variant of 頭昏腦脹|头昏脑胀[tou2 hun1 nao3 zhang4]
